Mission Orders

The Black Claw in the north Feral Valley are ripping apart any travelers who use that route.

Hunt {@LinkCreature:41#2004#Black Claw fighters} and {@LinkCreature:41#2005#Black Claw raiders}.

Report to Coordinator Glasrinne when mission is complete.
Youâ€™ve earned the thanks of the federation. Your guild is an inspiration to all!
